data.name: BooleanType_Description
data.value: The `Boolean` scalar type represents `true` or `false`.

data.name: ByteType_Description
data.value: The `Byte` scalar type represents non-fractional whole numeric values. Byte can represent values between 0 and 255.

data.name: DataLoaderRegistry_KeyNullOrEmpty
data.value: The DataLoader key cannot be null or empty.

data.name: DataLoaderResolverContextExtensions_RegistryIsNull
data.value: No DataLoader registry was registerd with your dependency injection.

data.name: DataLoaderResolverContextExtensions_UnableToRegister
data.value: Unable to register a DataLoader with your DataLoader registry.

data.name: DateTimeType_Description
data.value: The `DateTime` scalar represents an ISO-8601 compliant date time type.

data.name: DateType_Description
data.value: The `Date` scalar represents an ISO-8601 compliant date type.

data.name: DecimalType_Description
data.value: The built-in `Decimal` scalar type.

data.name: DirectiveTypeFactory_LocationNotSupported
data.value: The specified location `{0}` is not supported.

data.name: DirectiveType_UnableToConvert
data.value: Unable to convert the argument value to the specified type.

data.name: Edge_CursorIsNull
data.value: The cursor cannot be null or empty.

data.name: EnumType_NoValues
data.value: The enum type `{0}` has no values.

data.name: FloatType_Description
data.value: The `Float` scalar type represents signed double-precision fractional values as specified by [IEEE 754](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_floating_point).

data.name: IdType_Description
data.value: The `ID` scalar type represents a unique identifier, often used to refetch an object or as key for a cache. The ID type appears in a JSON response as a String; however, it is not intended to be human-readable. When expected as an input type, any string (such as `"4"`) or integer (such as `4`) input value will be accepted as an ID.

data.name: InputObjectType_CannotParseLiteral
data.value: The input object type can only parse object value literals.

data.name: InputObjectType_NoFields
data.value: The input object `{0}` does not have any fields.

data.name: IntType_Description
data.value: The `Int` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole numeric values. Int can represent values between -(2^31) and 2^31 - 1.

data.name: LongType_Description
data.value: The `Long` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole 64-bit numeric values. Long can represent values between -(2^63) and 2^63 - 1.

data.name: MultiplierPathType_Description
data.value: The multiplier path scalar represents a valid GraphQL multiplier path string.

data.name: NameType_Description
data.value: The name scalar represents a valid GraphQL name as specified in the spec and can be used to refer to fields or types.

data.name: Name_Cannot_BeEmpty
data.value: The multiplier path scalar represents a valid GraphQL multiplier path string.

data.name: Reflection_MemberMust_BeMethodOrProperty
data.value: The member expression must specify a property or method that is public and that belongs to the type {0}

data.name: Scalar_Cannot_Deserialize
data.value: {0} cannot deserialize the given value.

data.name: Scalar_Cannot_ParseLiteral
data.value: {0} cannot parse the given literal of type `{1}`.

data.name: Scalar_Cannot_ParseValue
data.value: {0} cannot parse the given value of type `{1}`.

data.name: Scalar_Cannot_Serialize
data.value: {0} cannot serialize the given value.

data.name: ShortType_Description
data.value: The `Short` scalar type represents non-fractional signed whole 16-bit numeric values. Short can represent values between -(2^15) and 2^15 - 1.

data.name: StringType_Description
data.value: The `String` scalar type represents textual data, represented as UTF-8 character sequences. The String type is most often used by GraphQL to represent free-form human-readable text.

data.name: String_Argument_NullOrEmpty
data.value: The `{0}` cannot be null or empty.

data.name: TypeExtensions_InvalidStructure
data.value: The type structure is invalid.

data.name: TypeExtensions_KindIsNotSupported
data.value: The specified type kind is not supported.

data.name: TypeExtensions_NoListType
data.value: The specified type is not a valid list type.

data.name: TypeExtensions_TypeIsNotOfT
data.value: The given type is not a {0}.

data.name: TypeResourceHelper_TypeNameEmptyOrNull
data.value: The typeName mustn't be null or empty.
